description:
Kitakore and THRIVE are cast to star in world famous french director Sophie Vebelle`s new movie "Les chiens aboient." With the movie premiering worldwide, the boys are naturally excited. Despite being cast in the leading role, Aizomem is his usual self. When Tsubasa says they should work together to make the movie a success, he coolly responds that idols only think of themselves. However, the directors sees through him...
Source: crunchyroll
